INTERESTS
Why they want to be a part of this program:
	* As a middle school math teacher I am questioned regularly about how the topics we cover are relevant to the real world. I would love an opportunity to see and work in an area where I can see the skills I teach applied to a career field.

Why they want to be a part of this program:

	* Life Science / Biology
	* Earth & Environmental Science
	* Math
	* Agriculture, Food, Natural Resources
	* Health Professions (e.g. medical, nursing, pharmacy, veterinary, etc.)
	* Trades & Industry (e.g. manufacturing, automotive, construction, etc.)
